name: Kentucky Special Needs Adoption (Adoption Services Branch)
description: State-run adoption program through the Kentucky Cabinet for Health and Family Services. Provides adoption services for children with special needs, including adoption assistance programs, birth parent searches for adult adoptees, and the Kentucky Adoption Profile Exchange (KAPE). They also administer the Kentucky Putative Father Registry and provide support for families adopting children with special needs. Offers monthly subsidies and one-time adoption expense reimbursements for qualifying families.
source: Verified from official Kentucky government website and cross-referenced with multiple sources
